overview: Director Liam MacRae transports us to the East shores of San Francisco Bay, where warm instrumentals evoke hazy waterside visuals. On a hike in the sunbathed hills of Berkeley, Chaz talks about the importance of honesty, his dog Michael, and nerding out on skate videos - all of which have influenced his creative manner.  With a focus on the interplay of location and sound, music and visuals, MacRae and Bundick bring the west coast heat to the rest of us. Once the music starts, youâ€™re anywhere but here.
tagline: Keep it real, keep it light, and take time to experiment: these are our three lessons in creativity as instructed by Chaz Bundick.
title: Lessons with Toro y Moi
